author: GameSpot
description:
Tune into the Gearbox Main Theater Show! Check out some can’t-miss reveals from Borderlands 4 developers and an update on Risk of Rain 2: Alloyed Collective.

This PAX 2025 panel will be from 1pm - 2pm PT.
title: Gearbox PAX West Panel Livestream (Borderlands 4, Risk of Rain 2: Alloyed Collective, and More)

author: GameSpot
description:
Battlefield 6 brings the most advanced PC experience in franchise history with 4K visuals, uncapped frame rates, ultrawide support, and over 600 customization options. Protected by Javelin Anti-Cheat and powered by NVIDIA DLSS, Intel XeSS, and AMD FSR, this is Battlefield built for the ultimate PC experience.

Portal returns as the ultimate sandbox - bigger, faster, and more flexible than ever. Build it. Share it. Play it. With full progression, the battlefield is yours to shape.

Battlefield your way. On PC, October 10.

#Battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 - Official PC Features Overview Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
We got a look at some new Silent Hill F gameplay during Gamescom 2025. Check out 10 minutes of action, exploration and more. Silent Hill F release on September 25th on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X and S. For more on Jess Cogwell's impressions from her hands on time in Japan check out this preview: https://youtu.be/1G2BDFed_Jw

Timestamps: 
0:00 Intro
0:10 Exploration
0:46 Escape Sequence
1:27 Meeting and Fighting an Enemy
2:12 More Exploration
3:13 More Combat
3:48 Short Cinematic
4:49 Exploration and new enemy
5:39 Meeting a larger boss like enemy
6:18 Exploring the fields
8:03 Exploring a new area with new enemy

#silenthill #silenthillf #gaming
title: Silent Hill f - 10 Minutes of NEW Gameplay

author: GameSpot
description:
Uncharted territory? Unknown risks? Unimaginable threats? That’s our kinda expedition.

Burst through The Gloom spore clouds with the Dust Devils Premium Warbond* – packed with explosive weaponry, armour and more for all your days of Super Earth service.

*Requires base game, paid purchase of Super Credits, and game progression to unlock. 

#ps5 #ps5games #pcgames #helldivers2
title: Helldivers 2 - Dust Devils Warbond Gameplay Trailer

author: GameSpot
description: Can the bond between Hawlucha and its Trainer be enough to take down the formidable Machamp? One thing is for sure—when these two strong Fighting-type Pokémon enter the ring, fists will fly!
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A | Hawlucha vs. Machamp FULL MATCH | Cinematic Trailer
